location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas M Weguelen, Commissary General at Fort William [Calcutta], to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of letters dated 1 July, 22 September and 1 October 1814 regarding the shipment of sulphur from Bushire to Fort William . The letter also informs Bruce that the quality of subsequent shipments of sulphur was inferior and will no longer be required.
